firstName.min: First name must be at least 2 characters
firstName.format: First name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

lastName.min: Last name must be at least 2 characters
lastName.format: Last name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

maidenName.format: Maiden name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

dateOfBirth.min: Date of birth cannot be before 1900
dateOfBirth.max: Date of birth cannot be in the future
dateOfBirth.age: You must be at least 18 years old

placeOfBirth.min: Place of birth must be at least 2 characters
placeOfBirth.max: Place of birth cannot exceed 100 characters
placeOfBirth.format: Place of birth can only contain letters, spaces, commas, periods and hyphens

countryOfTaxResidence.required: Please select your country of tax residence

taxIdentificationNumber.format: Tax identification number must contain only numbers

occupation.min: Occupation must be at least 2 characters
occupation.format: Occupation can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and ampersands

currentEmployer.format: Current employer can only contain letters, numbers, spaces and basic punctuation
